page.title: 04HOUSING IN LAMERTON
page.content: Lamerton has a mixture of houses,old ones, new ones, big ones and small ones.Lamerton has a post office, a church and a pub.A big house in Lamerton is called Great Hayes farm.It was built in the 13th century.Inside the house it has lots of chimmneys and fireplaces.Rebecca Piper from our school lives at Great Hayes.Another big house in Lamerton is now an old peoples' home. It is called Venn House.It was rebuilt by Richard Parsons in 1817.It is double_L_shaped and faces to the south.There's one more big house in Lamerton. It is a farm_house and is called Chaddlehanger. Chaddlehanger was built in 1707, and most of it's land is grassland.Chaddlerhanger is also L_shaped and faces to the south.
